20.fullDescription:
A possible integer underflow exists in the function `transfer(address,uint256)`.
The subtraction may result in a value < 0.
20.name: ArithmeticVulnerability

22.fullDescription:
A possible integer underflow exists in the function `transfer(address,uint256)`.
The subtraction may result in a value < 0.
22.name: ArithmeticVulnerability

23.fullDescription:
A possible integer overflow exists in the function `transfer(address,uint256)`.
The addition or multiplication may result in a value higher than the maximum representable integer.
23.name: ArithmeticVulnerability

fullDescription.text:
A possible integer underflow exists in the function `transfer(address,uint256)`.
The subtraction may result in a value < 0.

A possible integer overflow exists in the function `transfer(address,uint256)`.
The addition or multiplication may result in a value higher than the maximum representable integer.
